short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension to check compliance with the RGAA standard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Accelerate and simplify your RGAA accessibility audits directly in your browser!

Designed for auditors, developers and all web stakeholders concerned about accessibility, this extension available for Chrome and Firefox browsers automates the verification of RGAA accessibility criteria, offering you significant time savings and precise analysis.

The RGAA, aligned with WCAG standards, aims to ensure digital accessibility for people with disabilities, targeting public services and large companies in France with a turnover greater than 250 million euros, for a more inclusive internet.

For more details, please visit the official RGAA website.
